title: /root/.ratpoisonrc

```

# Generated by git.2mb.codes/~stormdragon2976/strychnine

set fgcolor black
set bgcolor silver
set framesels 123456789
set font -xos4-terminus-medium-r-normal-*-*-140-*-*-c-*-iso8859-1
set border 0
set barborder 0
set padding 0 0 0 0
set barpadding 0 0
set winname class
set winfmt %n %s %c
set winliststyle column
set wingravity n 
set gravity center 
set transgravity center
set bargravity nw
set waitcursor 1

startup_message off
escape Super_L
banish

exec xlunch --notitle --desktop --noprompt --dontquit --multiple
exec nvidia-settings
exec /usr/lib/notification-daemon/notification-daemon
exec brightnessctl s 7
exec unclutter
exec rpws init 5 -k
exec setxkbmap br -option kpdl:dot

definekey top M-Return exec gmrun
definekey top M-Tab next
definekey top M-ISO_Left_Tab prev
definekey top M-i exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e wpa_supplicant -B -c /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf -i wlp8s0

bind 1 only
bind 2 hsplit
bind 3 vsplit
bind 4 resize
bind b exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e neofetch
bind c exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls
bind e exec mousepad
bind f exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge
bind g exec gsimplecal
bind i exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e wifish
bind p exec xfce4-screenshooter
bind r remove
bind t exec thunar
bind v exec viewnior
bind w exec ratpoison -c "select `ratpoison -c "windows" | dmenu | awk '{print $1}'`"
bind s-b exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e bpytop
bind s-c exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 12x24 -ls
bind s-e exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 12x24 -ls -e rnano -S -i -O -x -w -m
bind s-i exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e nmtui
bind s-k kill
bind s-l exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e ./run /home/mario/seq/off
bind s-x fselect
bind BackSpace undo
bind s-BackSpace redo
bind s-Down exchangedown
bind s-Up exchangeup
bind s-Left exchangeleft
bind s-Right exchangeright
bind s-Return prev
bind s-Tab focuslast
bind Tab focus
bind Escape abort
bind apostrophe help
bind space exec dmenu_run
bind Home exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=hnpfjngllnobngcgfapefoaidbinmjnm --app-url=https://web.whatsapp.com/
bind End exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=kjgfgldnnfoeklkmfkjfagphfepbbdan "--app-url=https://meet.google.com/"
bind Delete exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e cpupower frequency-info
bind s-Delete exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e cpupower frequency-set -g performance
bind F1 exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=gaihlckmgpjdgmaikncaomnahklbcgak --app-url=https://www.bible.com/bible/
bind F2 exec /opt/BlueMail/bluemail --no-sandbox
bind F3 exec catfish
bind F4 exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=ddjmdokflopjnjnpmkpofehfhjeanhph --app-url=https://beancount.io/ledger/0/account/Expenses/changes/
bind F5 exec spotify
bind F9 exec amixer set Master 0
bind F10 exec amixer set Master 25%-
bind F11 exec amixer set Master 25%+
bind F12 exec /root/darkmod/thedarkmod.x64
bind KP_Enter /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=ogjlbiopdidgogioefmnmeelgkidmfoo --app-url=https://www.tecconcursos.com.br/
bind KP_Separator exec /usr/bin/Gingko-2.4.15.AppImage --no-sandbox
bind KP_0 exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=ghdcdnbloldlnjelkidcegokdfnmgknm --app-url=https://app.gingkowriter.com/
bind KP_1 exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=cjmkdloaeckmnapbbnofepkincodpoeh --app-url=https://app.chessclub.com/dashboard
bind KP_2 exec /opt/microsoft/msedge/microsoft-edge --profile-directory=Default --app-id=ifmhokpjoimcbdbdpfhkkiejegndlhia --app-url=https://www.chessclub.com/library/joel_benjamin
bind KP_3 exec urxvt -fg silver -sl 1000 -vb +sb -b 0 -tr -sh 25 -fade 30 -font 10x20 -ls -hold -e bash -c 'cd /root/LucasChessR/ && sh ./LucasR.sh'

```
